cleaned_text: & energy) Slightly Sweet Cocoa Latte Blend w/ Organic Dutch Style Cocoa, Organic Peppermint, Organic Vanilla, Non-GMO Lakanto Monkfruit & Himalayan Salt. 10-15 servings & sugar free. DIRECTIONS: Mix 2-3 TBSP with steamed milk of choice (increase mix based on size of mug & how rich you like it). Sip slowly & enjoy your new daily ritual. Great mixed with coffee! NOTE FOR PRE-ORDERS: This item will begin shipping week of September 11th. As a small business, these blends are made by hand to order so there is only a limited quantity available per month. Shipping costs calculated based on quantity & weight.
